resources.string: 1. How can I open the setup page?
After the application is installed in the device, you will see a shortcut to "Configure Lock Lock Screen" with an icon that is locked, like the icon in this dialog to go to the settings page.
2. I cannot remove this application. What can I do?
Before you can remove the application, you must go to the settings page and click "Remove device management".
3. Why can\'t I see any animation even if I select one of the settings pages?
First, you must go to "Settings> Developer Option" and set "Transition animation scale" to 1x. If this cannot help, you must reinstall.
This app require Device Admin permission in order to lock and switch off the screen
